name: Animal Notes
description:
Features

*Deck-building, Deck-construction game:
8 animals that players choose become puzzle components. They will level up and grow.

*40 animals, 40 powers:
Every animal has different powers. 7.7 million combinations give players a fresh game experience every time.

*12 unique stages:
Players must take the environmental effects into consideration when choosing animals and planning strategies.

*Easy to play, hard to master:
Intuitive game play makes it easy for everyone, but you must be creative and strategic to get higher scores.

*Maximize animals' powers:
Animals become stronger as they level up during the game.

*32 endangered animals:
Collect stars to rescue more animals and continue the adventure with them.
